name: Dinner Tonight: Peach Caprese Salad
description: Beyond the absolutely brilliant idea this recipe for peach caprese salad is—substituting the juicy summer tomato with the fragrant, sweet peach—there's not much more to say about this variation on an a classic. All the usual elements are there: creamy...
recipeIngredient: 3 ripe peaches, halved, pitted, and sliced
8 ounces fresh mozzarella, cut into slices

recipeInstructions.text: Halve each peach, remove the pit, and slice. Slice the mozzarella and tear the basil leaves.
Arrange peaches and mozzarella on a large plate. Drizzle with olive oil and vinegar to taste (aim for a 3-to-1 ration of oil to vinegar). Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and basil.
